play.libs

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.libs.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    Time utils Provides a parser for time expression.

    Time expressions provide the ability to specify complex time combinations such as "2d", "1w2d3h10s" or "2d4h10s".
